hero.title: AI-Powered Digital Health Solutions
hero.subheading: Expanding Access to Quality Healthcare Through AI & Digital Technologies
hero.intro: Panacea Medcare delivers AI-enabled digital healthcare solutions designed to address critical workforce shortages, delayed diagnoses, and rising disease burdens across Africa, the Middle East, and emerging markets. Our platforms combine telemedicine, artificial intelligence, and global medical expertise to deliver scalable, cost-effective, and impactful healthcare solutions.

telemedicine.title: Telemedicine & Virtual Care Platforms
telemedicine.content: Our telemedicine platform connects patients, hospitals, and healthcare facilities with Indian and international specialists using secure digital platforms. This enables seamless consultations, follow-ups, and multidisciplinary discussions, breaking down geographical barriers to quality healthcare.
telemedicine.idealFor: Hospitals, government programs, corporate healthcare, embassies & NGOs

aiTeleradiology.title: AI Teleradiology
aiTeleradiology.tagline: 24×7 Reporting | Faster Diagnosis | Reduced Radiologist Dependency
aiTeleradiology.content: Our AI-assisted radiology reporting combines artificial intelligence with expert radiologists in India, enabling fast, accurate, round-the-clock diagnostics. This solution significantly reduces dependency on local radiologists while maintaining high diagnostic accuracy.

aiTBScreening.title: AI-Based TB Screening
aiTBScreening.content: Our AI analysis of chest X-rays enables early TB detection, especially for mass screening in high-prevalence regions. This technology helps identify suspected cases rapidly, enabling timely intervention and treatment.
capabilities: AI detection of pulmonary TB from chest X-rays
Works in low-resource & mobile screening setups
aiTBScreening.idealFor: National TB programs, public hospitals, NGOs, mobile health units, prisons & refugee camps

aiTelepathology.title: AI Telepathology
aiTelepathology.tagline: Digitized Pathology for Faster, Consistent Diagnoses
aiTelepathology.content: Our telepathology solution digitizes pathology slides, enabling AI-based analysis and remote expert reporting. This ensures faster, more consistent diagnoses while maintaining the highest standards of accuracy.

aiCancerScreening.title: AI Cancer Screening
aiCancerScreening.tagline: Detect Early. Treat Early. Save Lives.
aiCancerScreening.content: Our AI-powered cancer screening solutions enable early detection for population-level screening, leading to better treatment outcomes and improved survival rates.

aiSecondOpinion.title: AI Second Opinion Platforms
aiSecondOpinion.tagline: Expert Validation for Critical Medical Decisions
aiSecondOpinion.content: Our AI-structured medical data platform connects patients and clinicians with leading global specialists for accurate second opinions. This ensures critical medical decisions are validated by world-class expertise.
aiSecondOpinion.content2: The platform organizes patient data, medical history, and diagnostic reports in a structured format, enabling specialists to provide comprehensive second opinions efficiently.

hospitalAnalytics.title: Hospital Analytics & AI-Clinical Decision Support Systems
hospitalAnalytics.content: Our hospital analytics and AI-Clinical Decision Support Systems provide real-time analytics, decision support, early warning systems, and hospital efficiency improvements. These solutions transform healthcare data into actionable insights.
capabilities: Early warning systems for critical care

publicHealth.title: Public Health–Focused Digital & AI Healthcare Solutions
publicHealth.content: Our solutions are specifically designed for governments, NGOs, Public-Private Partnerships (PPPs), donor-funded programs, and national health initiatives. We understand the unique challenges of public health systems and deliver solutions that address them effectively.

whyPanacea.title: Why Panacea Medcare?
points: Deep execution experience in Africa & high-burden regions
Indian medical expertise + global AI technology partners
Ideal for government, PPP & NGO programs
